title: Master Yi seemingly never banned in low elo
body: Recently been playing ranked games and was on an extended losing streak playing as Kayle, Rengar, and or Lee Sin jungle when I had my preferred role, which was the majority of the time since jungle doesn't appear to be as desirable as a lane role. After a while of this continuing I decided to pick up Yi in the jungle as I played with him when I owned no more expensive champs. In the last four games I played as him I went 15+ kills consistently and had a positive KDA. He is almost never banned in games I have played and while being a selfish pick for the team with the current tanky jungle meta, appears to be a free win. Just looking for some tips or suggestions for more build ideas, and an explanation as to how you can shut down a snowballing Yi, due to his Q making him untargetable and allowing him to dodge nearly all hard CC if timed correctly.

Because a late game champ is supposed to be broken late once they gets their feed.

It's incredibly easy to shut him down, 1 CC, 1 burst, 1 corpse. Well it's simplified but you get the idea, this guy really blows up very quickly.

Without ultimate nearly everything he has is on extreme cool downs (very exploitable early and vulnerable to jungle duels and invades), meaning, he is the edge lord champ who thrives living on "the edge", combined with his weak early strong late nature it also means his risk factors is incredibly high, and thus so is his reward factor.

His Q is not reliable because 

1. It needs a target that is both in range, in vision and non ally to work, 
2. It needs to be off CD, which is high without him killing somebody (and already lvl 6),
3. It's both his escape, dueling upperhand, burst, reposition and engage. If he uses it, he loses all other functions for up to 15-20 seconds if he isn't already fed as fk,
4. And when used as an escape, Yi doesn't just go to his target, there is a delay before he reappears again after vanishing, which can work with and also against him.

His W is a channel spell that doesn't heal instantly, vulnerable to grievous wounds, interruptible, long CD and self stun himself in place.

Yi loses his E passive when it's on CD.

His R only grants immunity to slows, with a nice AS and MS bonus. It only rewards Yi when he is doing well, i.e. getting kills, otherwise he is nearly having no ultimate, but just a somewhat stronger normal spell.

Let's not mention he countless anti-Yi strategy, champs and available builds out there.

There is a reason why besides the time when Yi went on his little rampage during the reign of AP Yi and FF, no one really have any issues with him except the low elo crowd. I really don't think he has too much or is too much to handle, at all.

Hard CC = Dead Yi.
Pick Naut, Thresh, Alistar, Lissandra, Vi, Leona, Maokai, Amumu...(continues to list every champion with a hard cc)
Not rocket science people. Esp Gold and below.

I mean I can tell they have an idea of what to do against a Yi, but whenever Morg throws out a stun, or anyone for that matter, all I have to do is Q an enemy champion or minion and they are helpless.
